name: Georgette Designer Salwar Suit
description: This Georgette Designer Salwar Suit is perfect for casual occasions with its light and flowy fabric. It offers both comfort and style.

name: Rani Pink Zariwork Suit
description: This vibrant Rani Pink Zariwork Suit is adorned with intricate zari embroidery, making it perfect for festive events.

name: Embroidered Party Wear Suit
description: Turn heads at any party with this Embroidered Party Wear Suit, featuring elegant embroidery for a sophisticated look.

name: Bridal Mehendi Lehenga
description: This Bridal Mehendi Lehenga is designed for brides-to-be with its intricate detailing and vibrant colors, ideal for pre-wedding functions.

name: Festive Wear Net Saree
description: Light and breezy, this Festive Wear Net Saree is ideal for celebratory events with its subtle design and elegant drape.

name: Heavy Border Designer Lehenga
description: Make a statement with this Heavy Border Designer Lehenga, featuring rich embroidery and a stunning border, perfect for weddings and formal occasions.

name: Traditional Designer Saree
description: This Traditional Designer Saree combines elegance with tradition, perfect for cultural gatherings and special occasions.

name: Floral Printed Georgette Suit
description: This Floral Printed Georgette Suit adds a touch of femininity with its delicate floral prints, ideal for casual and semi-formal events.

name: Stone Work Designer Saree
description: Dazzle at any event with this Stone Work Designer Saree, featuring intricate stone embellishments for a glamorous look.

name: Anarkali Designer Suit
description: This Anarkali Designer Suit offers a regal look with its flowing silhouette and detailed embroidery, perfect for formal gatherings.

name: Heavy Embroidered Lehenga
description: This Heavy Embroidered Lehenga is crafted for opulence with its detailed work and rich fabric, ideal for weddings and grand occasions.

name: Velvet Embroidered Suit
description: Luxurious and elegant, this Velvet Embroidered Suit is the perfect blend of comfort and style, making it suitable for both casual and formal events.
